Some personal stats since I started grad school 4.5 years ago:

Papers published: 2
Citations: 2

Data sets released: 15
Downloads: ~3300
Citations: 7#rstats packages: 5
Downloads: ~130k

Unfortunately, I think most academics stop reading after the first line.

— Jacob Kaplan (@JacobKaplan19) February 10, 2020

The #rstats custom #shiny input binding saga continues! I thought using an SVG as an input was exciting, well that was just JS -> R. Now I used R -> JS to bind the values from a data frame to the colors of the SVG! FULL CIRCLE BABY! [Shout out @grrrck's #JS4Shiny workshop ðŸ¥°] pic.twitter.com/Is2XtjWGNO

— Maya Gans (@Mayacelium) February 14, 2020
